body_html:
The guide provided in TinyMind's link installs CUDA 9.1, which seems to be not compatible with this wheel. You need to run

sudo apt-get install cuda-9-0

and not

sudo apt-get install cuda

EDIT: sorry there is a wheel for CUDA 9.1 although it is not listed in the "wheels you will most likely need".
body_text:
The guide provided in TinyMind's link installs CUDA 9.1, which seems to be not compatible with this wheel. You need to run
sudo apt-get install cuda-9-0
and not
sudo apt-get install cuda
EDIT: sorry there is a wheel for CUDA 9.1 although it is not listed in the "wheels you will most likely need".
body:
The guide provided in TinyMind's [link](https://github.com/mind/wheels#cuda) installs CUDA 9.1, which seems to be not compatible with this wheel. You need to run

`sudo apt-get install cuda-9-0`

and not

`sudo apt-get install cuda`

EDIT: sorry there is a [wheel](https://github.com/mind/wheels/releases/tag/tf1.4.1-gpu-cuda91) for CUDA 9.1 although it is not listed in the "wheels you will most likely need".
